stats.collections_by_year_query: SELECT YEAR(c.Release_date) AS 'Year', COUNT(*) AS 'Count' FROM Artist a JOIN Has_Collection hc ON a.Artist_URI = hc.HasC_artist_URI JOIN Collection c ON hc.HasC_collection_URI = c.Collection_URI JOIN U_Collection uc ON uc.Collection_URI = c.Collection_URI LEFT JOIN U_Review ur ON ur.Reivew_collection_URI= uc.Collection_URI AND ur.U_review = uc.Collection_username LEFT JOIN U_Rate urt ON urt.Rate_collection_URI= uc.Collection_URI AND urt.Rate_username = uc.Collection_username WHERE uc.Collection_username = %s GROUP BY YEAR(c.Release_date)
stats.collections_by_rating_query: SELECT urt.Rating AS Rating, COUNT(*) AS Count FROM Artist a JOIN Has_Collection hc ON a.Artist_URI = hc.HasC_artist_URI JOIN Collection c ON hc.HasC_collection_URI = c.Collection_URI JOIN U_Collection uc ON uc.Collection_URI = c.Collection_URI LEFT JOIN U_Review ur ON ur.Reivew_collection_URI= uc.Collection_URI AND ur.U_review = uc.Collection_username LEFT JOIN U_Rate urt ON urt.Rate_collection_URI= uc.Collection_URI AND urt.Rate_username = uc.Collection_username WHERE uc.Collection_username = %s GROUP BY urt.Rating
stats.collection_count_by_status_query: SELECT s.Status, COUNT(*) AS 'Count' FROM Artist a JOIN Has_Collection hc ON a.Artist_URI = hc.HasC_artist_URI JOIN Collection c ON hc.HasC_collection_URI = c.Collection_URI JOIN U_Collection uc ON uc.Collection_URI = c.Collection_URI JOIN U_Collection_Status s ON uc.Collection_URI = s.Collection_URI WHERE uc.Collection_username = %s GROUP BY s.Status
stats.total_minutes_listened_by_collection_sta: SELECT uc.Collection_username AS Username, SUM(t.Track_length) / (1000 * 60) AS 'Total Minutes Listened', COUNT(*) AS 'Number Tracks' FROM U_Collection uc JOIN Collection c ON uc.Collection_URI = c.Collection_URI JOIN Track_In_Collection tic ON c.Collection_URI = tic.TiC_collect_URI JOIN Track t ON tic.TiC_track_URI = t.Track_URI JOIN U_Collection_Status s ON uc.Collection_URI = s.Collection_URI AND s.Status = 'Complete' WHERE uc.Collection_username = %s GROUP BY uc.Collection_username

SELECT uc.Collection_username AS Username, SUM(t.Track_length) / (1000 * 60) AS 'Total Minutes Listened', COUNT(*) AS 'Number Tracks' FROM U_Collection uc JOIN Collection c ON uc.Collection_URI = c.Collection_URI JOIN Track_In_Collection tic ON c.Collection_URI = tic.TiC_collect_URI JOIN Track t ON tic.TiC_track_URI = t.Track_URI JOIN U_Collection_Status s ON uc.Collection_URI = s.Collection_URI AND s.Status = 'Planned' WHERE uc.Collection_username = %s GROUP BY uc.Collection_username
stats.total_minutes_listened_by_collection_que: SELECT uc.Collection_username AS Username, SUM(t.Track_length) / (1000 * 60) AS 'Total Minutes Listened', COUNT(*) AS 'Number Tracks' FROM U_Collection uc JOIN Collection c ON uc.Collection_URI = c.Collection_URI JOIN Track_In_Collection tic ON c.Collection_URI = tic.TiC_collect_URI JOIN Track t ON tic.TiC_track_URI = t.Track_URI WHERE uc.Collection_username = %s GROUP BY uc.Collection_username

collections.collection_query: INSERT IGNORE INTO Collection (Collection_URI, Collection_name, Type, Cover_image, Release_date) VALUES (%s, %s, %s, %s, %s)
collections.user_collection_query: INSERT IGNORE INTO U_Collection (Collection_username, Collection_URI) VALUES (%s, %s)
collections.user_status_query: INSERT IGNORE INTO U_Collection_Status (Collection_username, Collection_URI, Status) VALUES (%s, %s, %s)
collections.user_rate_query: INSERT IGNORE INTO U_Rate (Rate_username, Rate_collection_URI) VALUES (%s, %s)
collections.user_review_query: INSERT IGNORE INTO U_Review (U_Review, Reivew_collection_URI) VALUES (%s, %s)
collections.track_query: INSERT IGNORE INTO Track (Track_URI, Track_name, Track_length, Track_no) VALUES (%s, %s, %s, %s)
collections.artist_query: INSERT IGNORE INTO Artist (Artist_URI, Artist_name, Image) VALUES (%s, %s, %s)
collections.has_track_query: INSERT IGNORE INTO Has_Track (HasT_artist_URI, HasT_track_URI) VALUES (%s, %s)
collections.collection_genre_query: INSERT IGNORE INTO Collection_Genre (CG_collection_URI, Collec_genre) VALUES (%s, %s)
collections.has_collection_query: INSERT IGNORE INTO Has_Collection (HasC_artist_URI, HasC_collection_URI) VALUES (%s, %s)
collections.track_collection_query: INSERT IGNORE INTO Track_In_Collection (TiC_track_URI, TiC_collect_URI) VALUES (%s, %s)
collections.user_list_query: SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT a.Artist_name ORDER BY a.Artist_name ASC SEPARATOR ', ') AS Artists, c.Collection_name AS Collection, c.Collection_URI, c.Type, c.Cover_image, c.Release_date, ur.Review AS Review, urt.Rating AS Rating FROM Artist a JOIN Has_Collection hc ON a.Artist_URI = hc.HasC_artist_URI JOIN Collection c ON hc.HasC_collection_URI = c.Collection_URI JOIN U_Collection uc ON uc.Collection_URI = c.Collection_URI LEFT JOIN U_Review ur ON ur.Reivew_collection_URI= uc.Collection_URI AND ur.U_review = uc.Collection_username LEFT JOIN U_Rate urt ON urt.Rate_collection_URI= uc.Collection_URI AND urt.Rate_username = uc.Collection_username WHERE uc.Collection_username = %s GROUP BY uc.Collection_username, c.Collection_name, c.Collection_URI, c.Type, c.Cover_image, c.Release_date, ur.Review, urt.Rating;
collections.tracks_by_collection_query: SELECT t.Track_URI, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT a.Artist_name ORDER BY a.Artist_name ASC SEPARATOR ', ') AS Artists, t.Track_name, t.Track_length FROM Artist a JOIN Has_Collection hc ON a.Artist_URI = hc.HasC_artist_URI JOIN Collection c ON hc.HasC_collection_URI = c.Collection_URI JOIN Track_In_Collection tic ON c.Collection_URI = tic.TiC_collect_URI JOIN Track t ON tic.TiC_track_URI = t.Track_URI WHERE c.Collection_URI = %s GROUP BY t.Track_URI, t.Track_name, t.Track_length;

update.update_review_query: UPDATE U_Review SET Review = %s WHERE U_review = %s AND Reivew_collection_URI = %s;
update.update_rate_query: UPDATE U_Rate SET Rate_username = %s, Rate_collection_URI = %s, Rating = %s;
update.update_status_query: UPDATE U_Collection_Status SET Status = %s WHERE Collection_username = %s AND Collection_URI = %s;

credentials.user_in_db_query: SELECT Username FROM User WHERE Username = %s
credentials.register_query: INSERT IGNORE INTO User (Username, Password, User_profile_pic) VALUES (%s, %s, %s)
credentials.login_query: SELECT Username, Password FROM User WHERE Username = %s AND Password = %s
